result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
9:40 AM Defendant Kelsey A. Kmiecik appeared by video.  ADA Dennis Brown in court for State of Wisconsin. Court updates on public defender contacts. Bond continued.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for November 7, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Public Defender Status of Counsel Report - 2,559 contacts

11:31 AM Defendant Kelsey A. Kmiecik not in court.  ADA Dennis Brown in court for State of Wisconsin. Court speaks to the request for bond modification by defendant. Court notes that the defendant did post bond with today's date and time on bond form. Court notes the September 19 court date. State speaks to the court notice on the bond form. Court notes the September 19 hearing and will wait for that day.  No action on bond modification. Bond continued.
Public Defender Status of Counsel Report - 1,241 contacts
Motion hearing on September 8, 2022 at 11:30 am.

10:34 AM Defendant Kelsey A. Kmiecik in court, in custody with the Vilas County Jail without counsel.  Attorney Karl Peter Hayes in court for State of Wisconsin.  Eligible for Public Defender.  Still looking for representation.  Defendant speaks bond modification motion.  State objects to change bond.  Court denies bond modification at this time.  Court requests more information on the bond modification from defendant.  Bond continued.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 19, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Public Defender Status of Counsel Report - 755 Contacts

10:05 AM Defendant Kelsey A. Kmiecik in court, in custody.  Attorney Karl Peter Hayes in court for State of Wisconsin. Public defender is still seeking counsel for defendant. Motion to modify bond.  Court reviews written bond motion. Parties heard on bond motion.  Court denies bond modification.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 15, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on August 15, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Public Defender Status of Counsel Report - 695 Contacts

11:03 AM Defendant Kelsey A. Kmiecik in court, in custody.  Attorney Karl Peter Hayes in court for State of Wisconsin. Public defender is seeking counsel for defendant.  Bond continued.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 11, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Public Defender Status of Counsel Report - 105 contacts

Defendant Kelsey A. Kmiecik appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Karl Peter Hayes in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Jolin appears specially and notes that a private bar attorney will need to be appointed.  Court continues bond.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 6, 2022 at 10:45 am.

1:13 PM Defendant Kelsey A. Kmiecik appeared by video, in custody without counsel.  Attorney Karl Peter Hayes in court for State of Wisconsin.  Defendant is currently on a PO hold.  Complaint has not been received by defendant.  Will be served in the jail.  Charges read by Court.  $250 Cash bond set with conditions: Maintain absolute sobriety.  Bond form.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 31, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
